content: Let's begin with the highlights for the period, the acceleration in our financial results for the fourth quarter, we had important frameworks and some impacts, especially because of the rainfall in mining, but we were able to come up with a good response and we had a speed up in volumes, prices and costs and mining and in terms of steel, we had the traditional good performance, which enabled us to increase our EBITDA by 15% of the end of the year, a growth that should increase its pace throughout 2023.
